programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sticky Business - Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil's perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Guy Time - When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Game Nightmare - When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Downpour - Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Tangled Web - Tom and D'Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold's latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 Ep55
programme.desc: Turf War - It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Slamtools - Garby and Click-Clack must rescue the Dinotruxafter they are tied down by a destructive tribe of Slamtools who made an evil deal with D-Structs

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Blayde - Dozer and the crew must find a way to outsmart a clever bully named Blayde, a new ememy who kidnapped George and destroyed the Dozeratop mounds

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty,Big Baby - Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure, The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Turboldy Go Part 1,Part 2 - A mix-up puts the FAST crew on a rocket bound for outer space, The crew must work together to avoid space madness, debris ... and a fiery re-entry.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Nepal: Yeti Or Not - When a Yeti is spotted in Nepal, chasing away all the locals, the Wanderers investigate only to find out it's another Odlulu plot. They must work with Wizard Rockybeard to stop Yeti-Fritz get the Furball Key back

programme.desc: Tin Can Games - It's the Tin Can Games and Evil Pea wants to win the Tin Can Trophy. She cheats in the final race by putting a magnet on Supertato's back to stop him from going super fast.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep77
programme.desc: Sleepybyes - The Teletubbies say goodnight to the Tiddlytubbies; it is sleepybyes time. But Po isn't tired anymore and goes for a special ride on her scooter.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: Lemon - Dee encourages a friend to say 'lemon' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a yellow lemon, a leafy lemon, a juicy lemon and a sour lemon.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Mission Poppletoise - On today's poptastic adventure, Hooper find a Poppletoise on the beach. But when the Poppletoise's eggs start to hatch while she's away, can the friends find her in time?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Nimby Goes to Cloud Club - Nimby is too nervous to do his first Cloud Club badge. Messy and his friends come up with a plan to help Nimby overcome his nerves.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Exercise - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep38
programme.desc: Cubby - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Master of Puppets - At Squirrel Club, there's a story told in blocks, the tale of a first tooth, a fable about changing emotions, and a yarn involving the Squirrels as puppets.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Butterflies - Playing 'Butterflies' in the backyard is great fun, until Bluey runs away with Judo leaving Bingo all alone. Now poor Bingo's heartbroken and Bluey needs to make amends.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Piggyback - The Heelers take a long riverside walk, but Bingo's legs are tired, and she wants a piggyback. To distract her, mum and dad invent fun games and get her little legs moving again.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby Elephant - On Jen's birthday she and Andy are sent to follow a new baby elephant to make sure it can use it's trunk properly.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep15
programme.desc: Mission: Last Minute Visitor - Disability assistance dog Tinks and her owner Charli have a long list of chores to do, all in time for Annabel, their last minute visitor!

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep17
programme.desc: Dhole and Dwarf Mongoose - In this episode we meet the dhole and dwarf mongoose - their wild connection is that they both use sentries.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep15
programme.desc: Pirate Yearbook - Captain Captain is busy looking at last year's Pirate Yearbook, but something is wrong with her picture! So Captain Captain tells the pirates to come up with a better photo for this year's edition!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep30
programme.desc: The Colour Badge - Duggee is painting in his favourite colouring book. The Squirrels want to have a go too.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep29
programme.desc: The Harvest Badge - Duggee is getting ready to harvest the ripe crops that grown. The squirrels remember when they planted their seeds, watered them, and left them to grow, and now it's time to help Duggee pick them all.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The team are at Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite Nation Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall. Can the team save snowy Princess Glorinda and Firefall at the Yosemite National park?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Global Gameshow - It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco dazzling around the world gameshow!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep23
programme.desc: Steam Team to the Rescue - Thomas and the steam trains spring into action when Porter and the diesel engines run into a series of accidents that throw their deliveries off track.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Bus-Train - Cynthia is working on the bus so asks Stanley to take her passengers to the community centre. He uses Amare's tractor and trailer, his car, a boat, and a bath to make a Bus-Train.

programme.desc: (Live) Top stories, business news and market updates from across the region as Asia gears up for the day ahead.

programme.title: Zero Waste Kitchen Ep3
programme.desc: Do You Waste Half The Fish? (Eng Subtitles) - We consume 16kg of fish per person yearly. But host Issac discovers that in one local fish farm, offcuts amount to 30,000 tonnes a year. What mouth-watering recipes using these offcuts can be created?

programme.title: CNA Correspondent Ep40
programme.desc: They Are Coming Home (Eng Subtitles) - The Thai men had gone to Israel for jobs, for better lives. Instead they were taken hostage and held captive. A year passed with no news if they would be released. Then one night, everything changed.

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.

programme.title: The Peacemakers Ep3
programme.desc: Aceh: How to End a 30-Year War - In Aceh, a bloody battle between separatists and the Indonesian government raged for nearly 30 years. How did a former vice-president, Finnish businessman and Australian academic help to bring peace?

programme.title: Asia Now
programme.desc: (Live) Non-stop breaking stories, expert analysis and extensive news coverage every hour.
